<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.SummaryTableUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Utilities for summary set table.</description> <name>SummaryTableUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var SummaryTableUtil = Class.create();
SummaryTableUtil.prototype = { SUMMARY_SET : 'sys_report_summary', EXPIRES : 'expires',
initialize : function() { },
clean : function() { var ss = new GlideRecord(this.SUMMARY_SET); ss.addQuery(this.EXPIRES, "<", gs.nowNoTZ()); ss.deleteMultiple(); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2009-05-29 14:45:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8ccf34240a0a0b9e00b852cff639f4e6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SummaryTableUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Report Engine - store chart datasets in the database" source="com.glideapp.report2">c20efc0f6d2220100acb70b3534330c1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8ccf34240a0a0b9e00b852cff639f4e6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>glide.maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2009-05-29 15:28:32</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>340</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
